channel.title: Get Started on Oakestra
channel.description: Recent content in Get Started on Oakestra

item.title: Deploy your first App
item.description:
Requirements

  • You have a running Root Orchestrator with at least one Cluster Orchestrator registered.
  • You have at least one Worker Node Registered
  • (Optional) If you want the microservices to communicate, you need to have the NetManager installed and properly configured.
  • You can access the APIs at <root-orch-ip>:10000/api/docs
  • You can access the Dashboard at http://<root-orch-ip>

Your first application using the Dashboard ğŸ’»

item.title: Your First Oakestra Cluster
item.description:
High-level architecture

Oakestra lets you deploy your workload on devices of any size. From a small RasperryPi to a cloud instance far away on GCP or AWS. The tree structure enables you to create multiple clusters of resources.
